backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling user profiles and product CRUD with permission checks and ownership validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files in the project.
frontend/.env: Local development environment variables for branding, network, and backend canister ID.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment variables for branding, IC network, and backend canister ID.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining local and Internet Computer mainnet setup and requirements.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, themes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the frontend app with metadata and main script entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, headers, footers, and query client setup.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section presenting branding, product qualities, and informational content.
frontend/src/components/BrandSection.tsx: Component that renders a brand header and grid of product cards for that brand.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Displays a section highlighting featured automotive brands with styled cards for Turtle Wax and 3M.
frontend/src/components/ChangeRequestPan: Provides a dialog for submitting, viewing, and deleting locally stored change requests with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Renders an alert-based empty state message with optional action button.
frontend/src/components/HomeHero.tsx: Shows the homepage hero section with marketing text and a large banner image.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, pricing, wishlist and cart actions, and navigation to the product page.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, copyright, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the main site header with navigation, logo, cart and wishlist indicators, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines app branding defaults including name, slug, and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages cart state in local storage with functions to add, update, remove items, and compute totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
Custom hook that syncs a React state value with localStorage, supporting initialization and updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID using an actor and react-query, enabled once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductMutations.t: Defines create, update, and delete product mutations using actor methods and invalidates product queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches all products from the backend using react-query once the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useWishlist.ts: Manages wishlist state in localStorage with helpers to toggle, remove, count, and check products.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and base typography rules.
frontend/src/lib/pricing.ts: Provides formatting for INR currency and calculates discount percentages between MRP and sale price.
frontend/src/lib/productImages.ts: Maps known product brand/name pairs to static image paths and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/lib/resolveProductImage.ts: Resolves the best image source for a product using explicit paths, mapped images, or a fallback placeholder.
frontend/src/lib/uploadedProductImages.t: Lists uploaded product images with utilities to retrieve paths and check if a path is uploaded.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AllProductsPage.tsx: Displays all products with loading, error, and empty states, rendering each product via ProductCard.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with quantity controls, product images, totals, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page handling single-product or cart purchases, form validation, order placement, and address/payment inputs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero, brand sections, and product listings with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MyProductsPage.tsx: Admin-style page for creating, editing, and deleting products, including image selection and form dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Product detail view with image, pricing, wishlist, cart actions, and buy-now navigation.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays saved wishlist items with options to view, move to cart, or remove them.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending typography, container queries, animations, custom colors, fonts, and themes with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking features, schema version, and existing feature definitions for Urban Wax Studio.
